Test: public void testScriptTagInWhiteList() { Whitelist whitelist = Whitelist.relaxed(); whitelist.addTags( "script" ); }
Code: public static boolean isValid(String bodyHtml, Whitelist whitelist) { return new Cleaner(whitelist).isValidBodyHtml(bodyHtml); }
